languages.text: {n}На бесстрастном лице Идиры на миг прорезаются эмоции.{/n} "А я рада служить вам, Лорд-капитан. Вы дали мне то, чего не могла дать даже Леди Теодора. Вы дали мне будущее. Это дорогого стоит, и я намерена отдать вам этот долг сполна".

{n}Idira's impassive expression momentarily shows a glimpse of emotion.{/n} "And I am glad to serve you, Lord Captain. You gave me what even Lady Theodora could not. You gave me a future. It is a great gift, and I intend to repay this debt in full."
languages.original_text: {n}На бесстрастном лице Идиры на миг прорезаются эмоции.{/n} "А я рада служить вам, Лорд-капитан. Вы дали мне то, чего не могла дать даже Леди Теодора. Вы дали мне будущее. Это дорогого стоит, и я намерена отдать вам этот долг сполна".

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira's impassive expression momentarily shows a glimpse of emotion.{/n} "And I am glad to serve you, Lord Captain. You gave me what even Lady Theodora could not. You gave me a future. It is a great gift, and I intend to repay this debt in full."

{n}Idira's impassive expression momentarily shows a glimpse of emotion.{/n} "And I am glad to serve you, Lord Captain. You gave me what even Lady Theodora could not. You gave me a future. It is a great gift, and I intend to repay this debt in full."

{n}Idira's impassive expression momentarily shows a glimpse of emotion.{/n} "And I am glad to serve you, Lord Captain. You gave me what even Lady Theodora could not. You gave me a future. It is a great gift, and I intend to repay this debt in full."

{n}Idira's impassive expression momentarily shows a glimpse of emotion.{/n} "And I am glad to serve you, Lord Captain. You gave me what even Lady Theodora could not. You gave me a future. It is a great gift, and I intend to repay this debt in full."

{n}Idira's impassive expression momentarily shows a glimpse of emotion.{/n} "And I am glad to serve you, Lord Captain. You gave me what even Lady Theodora could not. You gave me a future. It is a great gift, and I intend to repay this debt in full."

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉原本冷漠的表情流露出了一丝情绪的波动。{/n}“而我很乐意为你效劳，舰长大人。你给了我就连西奥多拉夫人都给不了我的东西。你给了我一个未来，这是件伟大的礼物，而我打算连本带利还清这笔债务。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's impassive expression momentarily shows a glimpse of emotion.{/n} "And I am glad to serve you, Lord Captain. You gave me what even Lady Theodora could not. You gave me a future. It is a great gift, and I intend to repay this debt in full."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉原本冷漠的表情流露出了一丝情绪的波动。{/n}“而我很乐意为你效劳，舰长大人。你给了我就连西奥多拉夫人都给不了我的东西。你给了我一个未来，这是件伟大的礼物，而我打算连本带利还清这笔债务。”

languages.text: {n}Auf Idiras sonst teilnahmsloser Miene ist ganz kurz ein wenig Emotion zu sehen.{/n} "Und ich bin froh, Euch zu dienen, Lord Captain. Ihr habt mir gegeben, was mir nicht einmal Lady Theodora geben konnte. Ihr habt mir eine Zukunft gegeben. Das ist ein großes Geschenk, und ich habe vor, diese Schuld vollständig zu begleichen."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's impassive expression momentarily shows a glimpse of emotion.{/n} "And I am glad to serve you, Lord Captain. You gave me what even Lady Theodora could not. You gave me a future. It is a great gift, and I intend to repay this debt in full."

traits.locale_text: {n}Auf Idiras sonst teilnahmsloser Miene ist ganz kurz ein wenig Emotion zu sehen.{/n} "Und ich bin froh, Euch zu dienen, Lord Captain. Ihr habt mir gegeben, was mir nicht einmal Lady Theodora geben konnte. Ihr habt mir eine Zukunft gegeben. Das ist ein großes Geschenk, und ich habe vor, diese Schuld vollständig zu begleichen."

languages.text: {n}L'expression d'ordinaire impassible d'Idira trahit brièvement un semblant d'émotion.{/n} « Je suis heureuse de vous servir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Vous m'avez donné ce que même dame Théodora ne pouvait m'offrir : un avenir. C'est un cadeau inestimable, et j'espère sincèrement pouvoir un jour rembourser ma dette. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's impassive expression momentarily shows a glimpse of emotion.{/n} "And I am glad to serve you, Lord Captain. You gave me what even Lady Theodora could not. You gave me a future. It is a great gift, and I intend to repay this debt in full."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'expression d'ordinaire impassible d'Idira trahit brièvement un semblant d'émotion.{/n} « Je suis heureuse de vous servir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Vous m'avez donné ce que même dame Théodora ne pouvait m'offrir : un avenir. C'est un cadeau inestimable, et j'espère sincèrement pouvoir un jour rembourser ma dette. »

languages.text: {n}El impasible rostro de Idira muestra momentáneamente un atisbo de emoción.{/n} «Y yo me alegro de verle, Lord Capitán. Me dio lo que ni siquiera lady Theodora pudo: un futuro. Es un gran don y pienso pagárselo íntegramente».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's impassive expression momentarily shows a glimpse of emotion.{/n} "And I am glad to serve you, Lord Captain. You gave me what even Lady Theodora could not. You gave me a future. It is a great gift, and I intend to repay this debt in full."

traits.locale_text: {n}El impasible rostro de Idira muestra momentáneamente un atisbo de emoción.{/n} «Y yo me alegro de verle, Lord Capitán. Me dio lo que ni siquiera lady Theodora pudo: un futuro. Es un gran don y pienso pagárselo íntegramente».

languages.text: {n}イディラの無表情に一瞬、感情が垣間見えた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、あなたに仕えることができて光栄よ。シオドーラ様ですら与えられなかったものを、あなたは与えてくれた。あたいに未来を与えてくれたの。それは大きな贈り物なの。この恩に報いるつもりよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's impassive expression momentarily shows a glimpse of emotion.{/n} "And I am glad to serve you, Lord Captain. You gave me what even Lady Theodora could not. You gave me a future. It is a great gift, and I intend to repay this debt in full."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラの無表情に一瞬、感情が垣間見えた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、あなたに仕えることができて光栄よ。シオドーラ様ですら与えられなかったものを、あなたは与えてくれた。あたいに未来を与えてくれたの。それは大きな贈り物なの。この恩に報いるつもりよ」

languages.text: {n}İdira'nın kayıtsız yüzünde bir anlığına duygu kırıntıları peyda oluyor.{/n} "Ben de sana hizmet ettiğim için çok şanslıyım Lord Kaptan. Bana Leydi Theodora'nın bile veremediği bir şey verdin. Bana bir gelecek verdin. Bu benim için muazzam bir armağan, borcumu sonuna kadar ödemeye kararlıyım."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's impassive expression momentarily shows a glimpse of emotion.{/n} "And I am glad to serve you, Lord Captain. You gave me what even Lady Theodora could not. You gave me a future. It is a great gift, and I intend to repay this debt in full."
